head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths RICHARDSON, CATHERINE M. (NEE MURRAY)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths RICHARDSON, CATHERINE M. (NEE MURRAY)

block.p: RICHARDSON-Catherine M. (nee Murray) on May 4, 1998. Loving wife of the late Eugene P. Dear mother of John J. and the late Eugene F. Sister of Gloria Sager, Geraldine Keihm and the late Margaret Ryan. Also survived by eight grandchildren and 10 great grandchildren. Friends may call Tuesday, 7-9PM and Wednesday 2-5 & 7-9PM, Redden's Funeral Home Inc., 325 W. 14 Street, N.Y.C. Mass of Christian burial Thursday, 10AM St. Bernards R.C. Church. Interment Calvery Cemetery.
